While so__ expenses a__ reasonable, I c__ not acc___ itineraries th__ include mus____, ba__, o_ movies. Moving for____, I will b_ much stri____ about tra___ allowances. data.fullContent: The issue that we need to address is the abuse of the expense account by agents traveling for business purposes. While some expenses are reasonable, I can not accept itineraries that include museums, bars, or movies. Moving forward, I will be much stricter about travel allowances. Please remind your staff that they are expected to justify all expenses as being business-related.
data.answer: 我们需要解决的问题是代理为商务旅行滥用费用报销。虽然有些费用是合理的，但我不能接受包含博物馆、酒吧或电影的行程。今后，我将更加严格地规定旅行津贴。请提醒您的员工，希望他们证明所有费用与业务有关。
